channel.title: [C4D] Some of the shit ive been practising [Updated]
channel.description: Well ive been looking at a few tutorials on the internet(not on texturing as you can probably tell :P) but ive been fiddling and its been a while since i lasted mocked something up in C4D so i thought i would try these. One is a table the other is a cog. Cog [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Cog.png[/img] Different wood texture [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Cogwoodtex2.png[/img] Table [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Table.png[/img] With some sky [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Tablesky.png[/img] My newest texured floor [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Table-CustomWood.png[/img] Here are two textures ive been working on, ignore the ball that was just to see how the textures rected to another object A slightly modifed version of the above wood [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Wood.png[/img] Some nice metal, although it gets a bit busy if its used on a huge space as you can see [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Metal.png[/img] Same texture as above but close up [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Metalcloseup.png[/img]

item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

ok i’ll try that texture out and see how it goes

item.title: [C4D] Some of the shit ive been practising [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Those are somewhat good, much more unique than other beginning topics, i like the table. The only thing i can tell you right now is use more subdivisions or NURBS, and when your applying the texture to the floor, click the texture in the object tree and change it from UMV wrapping or whatever it is to CUBIC.

Read full topic
item.source: [C4D] Some of the shit ive been practising [Updated]

@sanga282 wrote:

Well ive been looking at a few tutorials on the internet(not on texturing as you can probably tell :P) but ive been fiddling and its been a while since i lasted mocked something up in C4D so i thought i would try these. One is a table the other is a cog.
Cog

Different wood texture

Table

Table.png831×450

With some sky
Tablesky.png870×466

My newest texured floor
Table-CustomWood.png861×461

Here are two textures ive been working on, ignore the ball that was just to see how the textures rected to another object
A slightly modifed version of the above wood
Wood.png867×464

Some nice metal, although it gets a bit busy if its used on a huge space as you can see
Metal.png868×462

Same texture as above but close up
Metalcloseup.png863×462
